name: Snake Plant
tip: Water every 2-3 weeks and keep in indirect light.

name: Spider Plant
tip: Thrives in bright, indirect light. Water weekly.

name: Aloe Vera
tip: Water deeply but infrequently. Loves sunny windows.

name: Pothos
tip: Can grow in low light. Water when soil is dry.

name: ZZ Plant
tip: Tolerates low light and irregular watering.

name: Geranium
tip: Tolerates low light and irregular watering.
